menuHero.title: BURGERS WITH ATTITUDE
menuHero.subtitle: 100% national beef, with a unique blend of premium cuts

classic.title: La Classic MADBITE
classic.description: Our classic burger with premium beef, cheddar cheese, tomato, lettuce, and our secret sauce.

cheese.title: Cheese Lover
cheese.description: Triple cheese: cheddar, gouda, and blue cheese with premium beef and crispy bacon for cheese lovers.

diablo.title: Diablo
diablo.description: Explosion of spice with jalapeños, spicy guacamole, pepper jack cheese, and our infernal sauce.

bbq.title: BBQ Deluxe
bbq.description: Smoky flavor with homemade barbecue sauce, caramelized onions, bacon, and melted cheddar cheese.

inferno.title: Inferno Chicken
inferno.description: For spicy lovers: jalapeños, spicy guacamole, pepper jack cheese, and habanero sauce.

crispy.title: Crispy Ranch
crispy.description: Crispy chicken with bacon, lettuce, tomato, cheddar cheese, and our homemade ranch sauce.

buffalo.title: Buffalo Chicken
buffalo.description: Extra crispy chicken with buffalo sauce, blue cheese, crispy celery, and ranch sauce.

double.title: Double Crispy
double.description: Double extra crispy chicken fillet, double cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and bourbon sauce.

asian.title: Spicy Asian
asian.description: Chicken marinated in teriyaki sauce, with Asian cabbage, pickled cucumbers, and sriracha mayonnaise.

falafel.title: Falafel Burger
falafel.description: Homemade falafel burger, hummus, cucumber, tomato, red onion, and vegan yogurt sauce.

beyond.title: Beyond Classic
beyond.description: Beyond Meat burger with vegan cheese, lettuce, tomato, red onion, and our special vegan sauce.

wings.title: Spicy Wings
wings.description: Chicken wings with buffalo sauce, accompanied by fresh salad and carrot sticks.

wings_fries.title: Wings with Fries
wings_fries.description: Crispy chicken wings with our fries, accompanied by barbecue sauce.

onion_rings.title: Onion Rings
onion_rings.description: Crispy onion rings accompanied by our special MADBITE sauce.

caesar.title: Caesar Salad
caesar.description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, grilled chicken, and our homemade Caesar dressing.

fresh_salad.title: Fresh Salad
fresh_salad.description: Mix of lettuces, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and balsamic dressing.

nuggets.title: Chicken Nuggets
nuggets.description: Delicious homemade chicken nuggets served with barbecue or honey mustard sauce.

wedges.title: Potato Wedges
wedges.description: Spiced potato wedges with our secret blend of herbs and spices.

fries.title: Rustic Fries
fries.description: Potatoes cut into thin strips, fried and seasoned with freshly ground salt and black pepper.

chocolate.title: Chocolate Coulant
chocolate.description: Chocolate cake with liquid heart and vanilla ice cream. An irresistible classic.

sundae.title: MADBITE Sundae
sundae.description: Selection of ice creams with whipped cream, syrup of your choice, cookies, and nuts.

cake.title: Chocolate Cake
cake.description: Three-layer chocolate cake with ganache, served with whipped cream and red berries.

cheesecake.title: Cheesecake
cheesecake.description: Classic creamy cheesecake with cookie base and red berry coulis.

tiramisu.title: Tiramisu
tiramisu.description: Authentic Italian tiramisu with coffee, mascarpone, ladyfingers, and cocoa powder.

sparkling.title: Sparkling Water
sparkling.description: Vichy Catalán sparkling mineral water, refreshing with bubbles.

water.title: Mineral Water
water.description: Aquafina natural mineral water, purified and refreshing.

amber.title: Amber Beer
amber.description: Classic Ambar beer, with balanced flavor and malty notes.

aquarius_lemon.title: Aquarius Lemon
aquarius_lemon.description: Refreshing lemon-flavored drink, perfect to accompany your meal.

aquarius_orange.title: Aquarius Orange
aquarius_orange.description: Refreshing orange-flavored drink, ideal for any moment.

budweiser.title: Budweiser Beer
budweiser.description: Premium American beer, smooth and refreshing with a touch of hops.

corona.title: Corona Beer
corona.description: Mexican beer, light and refreshing, served with a slice of lime.

desperados.title: Desperados Beer
desperados.description: Beer with a touch of tequila, unique and refreshing flavor.

estrella.title: Estrella Galicia
estrella.description: Spanish beer with body, intense and balanced flavor with a soft bitter finish.

coke_zero.title: Coca-Cola Zero
coke_zero.description: Sugar-free Coca-Cola soft drink, with the original flavor as always.

coke.title: Coca-Cola
coke.description: The classic cola soft drink with its unmistakable original flavor.

fanta_lemon.title: Fanta Lemon
fanta_lemon.description: Refreshing lemon-flavored soft drink, perfect for hot days.

fanta_orange.title: Fanta Orange
fanta_orange.description: Orange-flavored soft drink, bubbly and full of fruity flavor.

redbull.title: Red Bull
redbull.description: Energy drink to revitalize you, perfect to accompany your most intense meals.

sprite.title: Sprite
sprite.description: Clear soft drink with lime-lemon flavor, refreshing and bubbly.

aioli.title: Alioli
aioli.description: Creamy garlic sauce, perfect for accompanying fries and grilled meats.

bbq.title: Barbecue
bbq.description: Smoky and sweet sauce, perfect for accompanying burgers and grilled meats.

brava.title: Brava
brava.description: Traditional Spanish spicy sauce, perfect for accompanying potatoes and meats.

ketchup.title: Ketchup
ketchup.description: The classic tomato ketchup, sweet and tangy, perfect for any dish.

secret.title: MADBITE Secret
secret.description: Our exclusive secret sauce, a unique combination of flavors that will drive you crazy.

ranch.title: Ranch
ranch.description: Creamy herb sauce, ideal for accompanying chicken burgers and salads.

classic.title: Classic Combo
classic.description: Classic MADBITE + french fries + soft drink of your choice.

cheese.title: Cheese Combo
cheese.description: Cheese Lover + fries with cheddar cheese + soft drink of your choice.

diablo.title: Diablo Combo
diablo.description: Diablo Burger + spicy potatoes + soft drink of your choice.

chicken.title: Crispy Chicken Combo
chicken.description: Crispy Ranch + french fries + soft drink of your choice.

veggie.title: Veggie Combo
veggie.description: Falafel Burger + salad + drink of your choice.

family.title: Family Combo
family.description: 4 burgers of your choice + 2 appetizers + 4 drinks + 2 desserts to share.

footer.description: MADBITE is a burger chain with style and attitude. Our artisan burgers and premium ingredients make the difference.
footer.subscribeText: Subscribe to receive news and special offers.
footer.disclaimer: By subscribing you accept our privacy policy.
